titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States prohibiting the President from granting a pardon to an individual who has been employed by the Federal Government during such President's term of office.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 4/12/1988--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - States that the President may not grant a reprieve or a pardon to an individual who has been employed by the Government during such President's term of office.
